DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect oral Calcium Dobesilate versus cost prevention ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) high-risk woman underwent intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Calcium Dobesilate Versus Coasting Prevention Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Two hundred twenty woman risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ICSI cycle randomly schedule two equal group . In group A , ( Calcium Dobesilate group ) , 1 cap / 8 h Doxium ( 500mg ) give day HCG injection 3 week ; group B ( Coasting group ) , coast ( withhold gonadotrophin maintain pituitary suppression ) follow every day measure E2 3 day either give trigger cycle cancellation do
DOC.criteria: Infertile woman undergo intracytoplasmic sperm injection polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCO ) one following : Presence 20 follicle ultrasound E2 3000 pg/ml Retrieval 15 follicle
